QuestData.Title: Clefthoof Training: Rakkiri
QuestData.Description: Now that the clefthoof has a taste for combat, let's take it out into a harsher environment.$B$BTake your clefthoof out to the icy hills of Frostfire Ridge, and take on the great predator Rakkiri. We'll really put 'er toughness to the test.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Rakkiri while riding your Clefthoof-In-Training.
